PICK AND CHOOSE
You can flip, pinch, and stretch your eyes, nose, face and mouth separately or all together! What crazy combinations can you come up with to flip your face around and upside-down. 

BETTER, FASTER, STRONGER
Advanced facial recognition and isolation techniques mean more accurate flips for FUNNIER PICS!
